description:
Anri`s friend from junior high school. After being saved from delinquents by Seiji she falls in love and starts stalking him. While breaking into his apartment she discovers Selty`s head and is smashed against a wall by Seiji, leaving her face disfigured.
Following a plastic surgery she receives Selty`s face causing Seiji to fall in love with her and eloping together with him.
name: Harima Mika
